mention.text: Allen said. ; As Allen recalls it , the late-night incident began with the three men speeding down the Foothill Freeway in northern Los Angeles at what might have been as fast as 80 miles an hour
the three men in the car
the two-minute beating that has been shown repeatedly on national television.
the one who had her hand out saying I did n't do anything wrong
the one that had his hands up
the flashing lights of a California Highway Patrol car behind them
